name: Essential Comfort Firming Cream
about: What it is: A moisturizing cream, powered by Sulwhasoo's JISUN Firming Complex™ and JAUM Moisturizing Complex™, for visibly firmer skin....Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- JAUM Moisturizing Complex™: Soothes and moisturizes, relieving skin discomfort caused by dryness, while supporting a strong skin moisture barrier..- JISUN Firming Complex™: Contains a complex of goji berry, black soybean, and arrowroot to visibly improve skin’s resilience and firmness...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: Formulated with Sulwhasoo's JISUN Firming Complex™ and JAUM Moisturizing Complex™, this moisturizing, soft cream supports a strong skin barrier and has visibly firming effects...Clinical Results:.In a 14-day independent consumer study on 45 Asian women (ages 30 to 49):.- 100% agreed their skin felt moisturized.- 100% agreed their skin felt soft.- 98% agreed their skin's moisture lasted longer
ingredients: -JAUM Moisturizing Complex™: Soothes and moisturizes, relieving skin discomfort caused by dryness, while supporting a strong skin moisture barrier..-JISUN Firming Complex™: Contains a complex of goji berry, black soybean, and arrowroot to visibly improve skin’s resilience and firmness...Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cyclopentasiloxane, Diisostearyl Malate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Cyclohexasiloxane, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyacrylate-13, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Polyisobutene, Fragrance/Parfum, Honey/Mel/Miel, Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Limonene, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, Propanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Adenosine, Polysorbate 20, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Polysorbate 60, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, Crataegus Pinnatifida Fruit Extract, Linalool, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Pueraria Thunbergiana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Citronellol, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Morus Alba Leaf Extract, Citral, Geraniol, Rehmannia Glutinosa Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract, Polygonatum Odoratum Rhizome Extract, Benzyl Benzoate, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Soybean Extract, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Warm cream with your fingertips. .-Using continual lifting motions, smooth cream over your face and neck.

reviews.review_title: Sulwhasoo products are great! Very scented though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo is a great Korean brand. Light and fragrant, but this one is the basic one so doesn’t smell as fragrant as the other ginseng or expensive one. it is the lightest scent out of all the other ones. I think all Korean products have a strong scent. If you’re looking for unscented maybe try peach and lily products.  The downfall with Korean products is there is a 10 step haha with first care, serum, eye cream, etc. you want to buy them all but too expensive. My advice, try the sample set first before getting full size products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went to Sephora this Saturday as they had -20% off to buy my usual Clarins double serum and Tatcha cream, but the employee swore by Sulwhasoo products. I bought them, and they make my skin feel uncomfortable, dry, and irritated. This brand is harsh for sensitive skin. I'm going to return all of them, and the annoying part is that now I'll have to buy my products without a discount.
Never received my item. Beware check the package ; will not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love their S serum but this is more affordable and I think does a good job, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for about two weeks.  It has a lovely consistency and goes on well.  However, my face feels dry again in just a couple of hours.  Very disappointing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is pricey.... I do love it, though. After I put my facial oil, I put this on next, and it's the perfect amount of moisture. I have dry skin, especially in winter, but this gets the job done. Doesn't clog pores, either. I'll probably buy again.

reviews.review_title: Great but not for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent cream but not for sensitive skin, not PD friendly. As much as I tried to make this cream work, unfortunately it exacerbated my perioral dermatitis. The texture is wonderful, it doesn’t clog pores, and is super hydrating but unfortunately not sensitive skin friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using for over a year, by far the best moisturizer!! Doesn’t clog pores, doesn’t dry out on the skin… Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very light and provides decent amount of hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is very dry and I have tried many well-known brands in this price range but this is my favorite! To hydrate my face, I'd apply oil on top of my moisturizers but haven't needed to while using this cream.  I like that it doesn't feel heavy on my face and I wake up to soft, moisturized, dewy skin.  I hope it works as well in the winter.   I have a strong nose so I generally prefer fragrance free but didn't mind this scent. The best way to describe it is that it's light, pleasant, and pretty.  I will probably repeat purchase this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream I’ve used in a long time !  Having sensitive & dry skin, I simply love this. My skin feels hydrated, soft & soooo glowy. It works amazing as night cream & also under makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: bit pricey, great moister, lovely smell, rlly little, doesn’t last a long time, cute packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive skin this is not the product for you!!!!! I am 2 weeks over the 60 days policy for return and exchanges and my skin around my nose has completely dried out, is cracking and starting to bleed!!!  If the consultants try telling you this is great for sensitive skin don't do it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite night cream, the best ever for Asian skin. Never regret to purchase it and get the best result for couple months.

reviews.review_title: Good moisturizer only for dry skin not for oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed after one use.  it makes my face too oily
Not greasy, oily, or heavy at all.  I did feel a slight firming feeling but nothing significant.  Overall, don't believe its worth $120.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Sulwhasoo products for many years, this moisturizer I believe was reformulated, I bought the original years ago and liked it but not enough to repurchase..fast forward to several weeks ago when I was happy to see this was available in a newer packaging trial size. I LOVE IT. I use it all over my face and my neck and I do notice my skin looks a little firmer and my complexion looks beautiful and refreshed. Definitely would repurchase and get the larger jar. Sulwhasoo is a little slept on, their moisturizers are incredible and this is my new favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream so so much! I have super flaky dry skin during the winter and this cream is my number #1 moisture cream. It’s rich & thick! It moisture my skin very well. I’m so happy I get to know this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample with my order. I've been wanting to try this brand's skincare items for a long time, so I was excited to use the sample. But oh boy, the smell was something else! It smelled like ginger mixed with chemicals. It was a very thick/heavy cream. Not very watery, as I like my products to be. Since I only used it once, I couldn't tell if it did anything for me.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine! The perfect moisturize!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I've used. It fixes the dryest skin. It never feels heavy or greasy! It has no funny smell or perfume smell. Try it you'll love it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the cream it’s a good product but the price is tooo much not worth

This is a thick cream product perfect for winter. I am getting older and am finding my face getting more dry even non-winter so it’s perfect addition for locking moisture. It is scented so probably best not combining with other scented products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first used this product.  I really wanted it to work for me. It was very thick and had a ok scent.  I applied the face cream and it felt like my face needed more moisture.  I would definitely not just apply a lot of this cream on because it really just felt very heavy on my face which made me feel very uncomfortable.  Unfortunately, this is just one product that was just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Essential Comfort Firming Cream helps to hydrate your face, giving it a neat, luminous and healthy appearance. its consistency is a bit thick and you notice its luminosity on the skin immediately. Its a really nice cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand this brand never disappoints and as always worth every penny I love the texture of the cream and the sand it makes my face so soft yet firm I was gifted this product to try and now it has become one of the best products that I own

reviews.review_title: My Dry and Sensitive Skin loves it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves this product! I’m in my mid 30s, have very sensitive and dry skin. This cream has very thick whipped texture. I applied it as the last step of my skin routine. My skin feeling so soft and smooth the next morning! I love it has a very calming herbal scent that reminiscent my sleep oil blend. I will definitely repurchase the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich consistency and this product is scented. The smell does fade after time and I don't find it overwhelming.  The product feels more like a butter than a lotion, I used a generous amount on my entire face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is deeply moisturizing and hydrating while feeling lightweight and non-greasy on the skin. It leaves my skin feeling nourished, plump and dewy. It works great as a day cream and as a night cream and smells amazing, but the fragrance is a bit stronger than I would personally prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loveeee! Instantly makes my skin feel hydrated after a few uses. My skin stays moisturized hours after applying as well. It has helped even out my skin texture by making it feel more smooth and supple, smells really good and applies nicely too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most luxurious creams I have tried, ever. It feels like a soft cushiony pillow upon application and so luxe on my skin. I love it so much plus it goes perfectly with my combination skin. It is not greasy at all, absorbs so well and keeps my complexion hydrated through out the day. It has a soft pleasant scent to it. Overall my skin feels supple and I just enjoy it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This firming cream gave me such a pleasant surprise! I struggle with dry skin and it really leaves me feeling hydrated and supple. It sits so nicely on your skin and gets absorbed quickly. I love that a little goes a long way as well. Very effective product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and this firming cream is no exception! It perfectly moisturizes my skin without leaving it feeling oily. It smells amazing, and feels like absolute butter. I will definitely be restocking once I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Suwahsoo gifted me a sample size of the intensive cream. The product is very rich and absolutely moisturising from the number of uses I got out of it. The packaging is beautiful. I used it primarily as my night time skincare routine and my skin stayed hydrated and felt both supple and smooth in the morning. I need to get a full size to properly experience the firmness of skin effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite products from them because it’s so moisturizing and easy to use. It smells amazing and I love using this day and night. I realized that my skin became more glowy and soft, I really enjoy this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo keeps living up to high expectations. This cream is very nurturing and thick but it gets absorbed super quickly without leaving any sticky feeling. It makes my skin feel very soft and keeps it moisturized throughout the day. The cream has a very subtle ginseng scent to it, that is typical for all Sulwhasoo products. I really like it, it makes using it feel like a ritual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can understand why people rave about Sulwhasoo products. This cream felt amazing on my skin.  I definitely felt the hydration and creaminess after applying. The cream does not feel heavy on my skin and would definitely want to use it more to see the complete firming benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels so luxurious and rich on the skin. I love how it sinks in quickly and instantly soothes plus provides amazing hydration. My cheeks look nice and firm and the skin around my mouth especially. This makes my face flawless and moisturized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very dry skin, this cream is absolutely power hydrating. I love to use it  before my makeup  And my skin is so glow, firming and last all day.  I've been using for 2 weeks now and I really recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Top of the line product and you feel the results almost instantly. Makes your skin feel hydrated from the inside out. High quality and amazing for sensitive skin. Would be buying this product again as a holy grail

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this cream feels on my face! I started noticing small differences in how my face looks firmer and hydrated. It's not harsh on my skin at all and did not give me any break outs. It's a good cream for sensitive and acne-prone skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free by Sulhwasoo to review and try out recently! I really like it so far. I have dry skin and have always been looking for a moisturizer that keeps my skin hydrated throughout the day. I like this and will keep using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love how my skins feels after a week. I got the mini version of this amazing product. My skin feels hidrated and firm. I will definitely buy this cream again. This is a must have for a fabulous firm skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product surprised me! It smells really good, and it's so silky and smooth upon application. Within a few tries, my skin feels more moisturized and firm. I'm intrigued by this product and definitely interested in purchasing the full size jar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! The texture is perfect, not too thin but not too thick. Applies evenly and absorbs beautifully. I felt very moisturized and firm after using it. I will use this day and night! What a great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The lotion makes my skin feel renewed, hydrated, and firm just seconds after I apply it. It has a thick consistency but does not feel thick on my skin after being applied. After continuous use, the Sulwhasoo lotion has given a visible firmness and added a bounce to my skin's surface. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has a really nice and thick consistency to it. My skin feels super soft and hydrated each time I use it, but I'm not quite sure if I see a difference in firmness. I've been using it for over a week now on my face and neck so I'm not sure if maybe I need to use it for a longer period of time to see a difference. Other than that this is a great moisturizer!

reviews.review_title: I wish I could've tried for longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time tryin korean skincare and I enjoyed it!! My skin felt like glass after application, I cannot speak for longtime results because I was sent the smallest sample size (5ml)  so I ran out in two applications, but I liked how moisturizing it was

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and thickness of this cream. I believe it will be a perfect addition to my routine in the winter months. I’ve been using before bed and I’ve noticed that my skin does look smoother the next morning. The scent is not overwhelming and it absorbs quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for review. I think that it is a very moisturizing firming cream, but don’t really notice much of a difference compared to my other moisturizers. I also am not the biggest fan of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for about a week and I love it. I have loved how soft, moisturized and firm my skin looks. My skin has never looked better. The cream is more on the thicker side but it’s fast absorbing. It’s not fragrance free but the scent is not too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels very lush, hydrating, but not too heavy. The texture of this cream is a dream- it applies smoothly, soaks into the skin in seconds and leave the skin looking healthy and radiant all day long. I love this especially underneath my makeup- it protects my skin all day long and it doesn't get as dry as usual after wearing a full face of makeup all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never not been obsessed with any one sulwhasoo’s products! I always love trying their samples to see how my skin reacts to it & so far I’ve never had any skin issues with their products before! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great moisturizer, I do not like the scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer definitely firms the skin when applied. I could feel it instantly. It also hydrated the skin very very well. I will say it has a mint, earthy, herbal scent to it which I usually like but I did not enjoy it in this product. It is a great moisturizer and does have firming benefits but the scent is not my favorite. I haven’t used long enough to see any type of long term results but I would recommend this as long as the smell doesn’t bother you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a super rich cream that is very very moisturizing. I feel my skin is hydrated instantly when using this cream. I think it could help with firming and elasticity over time as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this small version, it’s perfect travel to go item. I use a little bit and I’ve noticed a difference after a month or so using it. I noticed some spots have gotten lighter. Skin feel and looks hydrated! I’ve been using this brand for some time, recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sulwhasoo’s essential comfort firming cream has left me feeling confident and young again. It’s smooth and light components make it easy to apply regularly without breaking out or feeling heavy.  My skin looks hydrated and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream truly feels nice on my skin .I been using this cream at nights upon waking up my skin feels firmer , hydrated and my complexion looks brighter. It feels very gentle on the skin and doesn’t leave a greasy feeling .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yummy hydration without any greasiness. And I even noticed some firming! I received a mini sample and will happily use it all but cannot imagine purchasing in the full size simply because of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Small packaging but I used it as a night cream over a reparative oil, and I woke up wit my skin feeling so refreshed! This product feels super creamy and hydrating. Cant wait to keep using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this after trying the trial pack because I just couldn’t live without it after using it for a couple weeks!! The cream leaves my skin looking so plumped and moisturized! It feels thick and creamy and just amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this product made me breakout. I used the product before bed and woke up with like 5-7 white heads on my chin. I am very sensitive to fragrance and it is very strong in this product. The product does feel very nice and nourishing on the skin, so if you don’t have sensitive or acne prone skin it might work better for you. I also didn’t find it to have a whipped texture - more like a rich cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! What a difference this cream makes to my skin - after using this religiously for a month my skin feels hydrated, smooth, and extra firm and youthful. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Sulwhasoo Firming Cream leaves my skin feeling hydrated after use without a greasy feel. I haven’t noticed a difference in firmness, but I just started using the cream! Definitely recommend and would purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a luxurious cream, I love the earthy smell and the heavy feeling texture of the cream. It's perfect for a night cream or to add it to your daily routine it left my skin looking hydrated, plump, and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Sulwhasoo in exchange for my honest review. The cream is very pleasant to apply, it is easily distributed over the skin, absorbed quickly enough, does not leave a film feeling (the skin is very soft, velvety to the touch). After 2 weeks of use, the pores have decreased, the skin is moisturized, the complexion is even. Perfect for my very dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the firming cream for about a week, and I definitely like it. It's very hydrating without leaving my skin looking oily and it seems to be making a difference in the firmness of my skin. However, I would prefer if it was fragrance free! Other than that it's a great product to add to your routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So happy I got to try this moisturizer. It definitely made my skin feel hydrated! I don’t have aged skin yet but I have a feeling if I continued to use this product it would help prevent wrinkles. I would recommend this cream.

I got this product for free for review. Trying it out I really like it only thing is the product was tiny and I was only able to try it out twice. But from the two times I have used it I did really like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m seriously in love with this product it’s really firm in the skin and I would totally!!!! Recommend this to everyone and all the products that they have you should get I got the full size for my mom

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has a very nice texture and scent to it. It is a firming cream but after using it, I did not notice much of the firming effect but it is very moisturizing. I will give it the benefit of the doubt and say maybe I need to use it for longer and use it 2x a day. Other than that it is a very nice hydrating and moisturizing cream.

This is such a great product! Such a big fan of the brand and this is a nice moisturizer for everyone. My wife also likes it, want to try the whole line one day! Heard such great things from other people

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this product. It’s really thick and moisturizing and feels luxurious to apply. It does have a pretty strong scent to it though so if you are sensitive to fragranced skincare I would keep that in mind. My skin did feel really plump and moisturized after application and use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so much smoother and plump after trying this face cream. Sulwhasoo is a new brand to me and I am trying to test out a lot of their products. This cream would be great for all skin types I think!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. The application is really smooth and applies without leaving a sticky feeling. However, I can’t get over the price point for how much you get.. I saw some results but nothing that was out of this world to justify that price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as a sample size, but I am excited to use it a lot! It makes my skin feel firm and tight. Because it's an expensive product I like to use it in a thin layer. Even though I apply a thin layer I feel like it is effective. It also has a nice subtle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have added this into my nightly routine and it is very hydrating my skin feels great. If the price weren’t so high and I had the budget, I would probably repurchase. However, if you don’t have the budget I think there are options just as good at a lower price. Love the product but probably won’t repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product from Sulwhasoo in exchange for my honest review.  I found this cream to be nicely hydrating on my normal to combo skin. It wasn't too heavy but provided just enough moisturizing that my skin felt soft & supple throughout the day.  After a week I felt that my skin was more balanced with less forehead oiliness occurring.  There does seem to be a slight white tea type of scent that I enjoyed.  It made the experience of smoothing it in feel a bit spa-like. My skin reacts quickly to products that are irritating and I haven't had any issues with this cream. I would highly recommend it if you want intense hydration that doesn't feel greasy or heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream for free in exchange for a review. This is my first time trying this brand, I like this.   I’ve been using it at night. It moisturizes well without feeling heavy (combo skin) and my skin feels healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Sulwhasoo in exchange for my honest review.   I have seen this brand in k-beauty skincare shops, with beautiful packaging in gift sets. I have been curious as to how effective this brand is.   The product that I tested, Essential Comfort Firming Cream, promises to tighten and firm the look of skin. It has a special blend of goji berries (anti-oxidants), black beans, and arrowroot that is supposed to be hydrating and help smooth skin.   My thoughts: When I applied this cream, I noticed that the cream is very rich (and can feel heavy for some people). Although this is intended for all skin types, those with dry skin would benefit the most. The texture is creamy and somewhat silky. After applying before bed, I didn’t notice anything special but the next morning is when I notice the impact and effectiveness of the cream. While washing and rinsing my face the next morning, I can feel how soft and smooth my face felt! After using for about a week, I noticed my face felt more hydrated.  It doesn’t look like my face is any firmer, but that change may be more gradual and require longer term use. There is a very subtle scent which I can’t quite place. It may be from the ingredients rather than an added fragrance.   This is a great skincare product, especially if you have dry skin. I’d love to use this cream together with other products in this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a smooth, lovely product that glides onto the skin. It quickly absorbs and leaves a glassy, glowy finish on the skin. It pairs well underneath makeup and I use it both in the morning and evening. Big fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
